snippet.title: Everything Wrong with RoboCop in 7 Minutes
snippet.description: Well... either we've heard your cries for the past three weeks, or else we looked at the Hollywood schedule and saw a RoboCop remake coming up soon. Either way, we had a blast looking for all the sins we could find.

snippet.title: Epic Meal Time: Snack Stadium
snippet.description: Epic Meal Time took over the Bud Light Hotel for the Super Bowl, and built a Snack Stadium! This is over 275,000 calories of snacks brought to you by the Steven Seagals of the cooking game!
